Generation V.Black: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.
Generation V.White: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
Generation V.Black 2: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
Generation V.White 2: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.

Generation VI.X: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
Generation VI.Y: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Its heartbeat generates electricity. When Blitzle is surprised and its heart rate goes up, the voltage of its electricity also rises.
Generation IX.Violet: This Pokémon prefers places with lots of lightning strikes. It catches lightning with its mane and stores the electricity within its body.
